name: Rootman: Bodycam Horror Footage
description:
In October 2005, two men, the owner of the house and a policeman who came to the call, disappeared in the woods. A week later, a footage was found from a policeman's body camera.

This is a short prototype that we created in 48 hours with my wife as part of the Global Game Jam 2023.

If you like the prototype, well, maybe we can continue it in the future. Write your ideas in the comments.
